title: Capstone mentor
content:
1)How many Capstone teams can usually one teacher mentor?? 
2)If one teacher has high demand for being a mentor how do thy usually choose which team to work with? (like do thy choose based on cgpa?)
3)How can i approach a teacher tat i want him or her as my capstone mentor?
Im in 4th sem with a cgpa of 7 with no major project works..

comments.body:
1) chill out
2) chill out
3) chill out

I hope it helped

1)depends on the teacher.some take a few others and take a lot.

2)first come first serve. Also helps if u have prior background with a teacher. Some also look for gender/cgpa diversity 

3) you can email them or meet them in person. Have a topic or domain in mind that you want to work on that the teacher's expertise also overlaps with
